name: the 'blossom' bonnet
description:
This sweet as can be blossom bonnet in 'earth' is a suitable size for ages 12-18 months.

Made from a wool/acrylic blend it is easy to care for and will keep your little pixie snug as a bug in those cooler months.

To care for this item simply wash by hand in warm water, dry flat in a shady spot, reshaping while wet. Excess water can be removed by dabbing with a towel. Please do not iron.

name: 'blossom' winter cowl
description:
A pretty piece of wintery goodness in 'raspberry', it measures approx. 44cm long by 35cm wide.  Carefully handmade using quality Australian yarn consisting of 82% wool 10% alpaca 4% bamboo & 4% viscose, it's oh so soft and gorgeous to touch.

With added length it's the cosiest winter warmer, worn all bunched up snug or pulled high as a hood.

To care for this item simply wash by hand in warm water, dry flat in a shady spot, reshaping while wet. Excess water can be removed by dabbing with a towel.

name: 'hold me' winter cowl
description:
This beautifully snug handmade piece is perfect for winter warming.  Made using 100%  wool in easy neutral tones, it'll go with most anything.

Measuring 94cm in diameter and 25cm in width, it can be worn a variety of ways by doubling around your neck to sit however you please, or slip your arms through and wear like a vest.

To care for this item simply wash by hand in luke-warm water, dry flat in a shady spot, reshaping while wet. Excess water can be removed by dabbing with a towel. Please do not iron.

A lovely gift idea or a special little handmade goodness just for you..

name: 'snuggle down' winter cowl
description:
This beautifully snug handmade piece is perfect for winter warming. Made using the softest acrylic yarn in light grey with pretty scalloped trim, its sure to be a staple wardrobe item.

Measuring 87cm in diameter and 28cm in width, it can be worn a variety of ways by doubling around your neck to sit however you please.

To care for this item simply wash by hand in luke-warm water, dry flat in a shady spot, reshaping while wet. Excess water can be removed by dabbing with a towel. Please do not iron.

A lovely gift idea or a special little handmade goodness just for you..

*Please note this is a sample introductory offer on sale for $60, custom orders using 100% wool are available and retail at $99

name: 'winter wanders' wristwarmer
description:
Oh so warm and cosy wrist warmers lovingly handmade using 100% pure Australian wool.

This particular pair in a soft neutral 'mushroom' tone are extra length for a little slouch or pulled up high for extra snuggly warmth.  Measuring 31.5cm long x 10.5cm wide, they will keep you super toasty as you wander this winter.

To care for this item simply wash by hand in luke-warm water, dry flat in a shady spot, reshaping while wet. Excess water can be removed by dabbing with a towel. Please do not iron.
